posts.post_content:
I have a few listed on ebay. All have the "Best Offer" options. Include that you are a member here with your offer. I will sell WELL below listed price for Net54 Members. I'm sure we can work out a deal, if you need them. Use the ebay 'zoom" feature to check them out closely.

NOTE: All deals will go through Ebay. Not open to off site offers. If you are in Canada, let me know and I'll disable the Global Shipping option. I understand that is very expensive for the buyer.

Thanks.
-Jimmy

Here is the Titus link. Then click on the right - "see other items".

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/172099421012?ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1555.l2649[/url]
